Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This work was supported by grants R01 HL148239 and R00 HL125912 to Clint L. Miller (PI) from the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI), a part of the National Institutes of Health (NIH). For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: “The original data description for the coronary artery multi-omics analysis (CAMOA) study can be found here: (Journal Citation __________)(PMID __________). The original data used for the analysis in this publication can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession number phs______.”
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Only full or expedited approvals are acceptable, and an ANNUAL IRB review is required base on the informed consents from the submitting institution.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
